website_summaries.verdict: If brightness is your goal, this complete set of trailer lights has all the essential pieces you need.
pros: Rated for use on a wide variety of trailer types
cons: Included cable may be too short

customer_reviews.title: Check on correct wiring.
customer_reviews.text: Wiring instructions are not complete. they send brown/yellow and green wiring harness, but light wires are black, red and green and no cleare explanation of which is tail and which is turn/stop. I had to test to find out. My old lights had Y, GR, and BR. wires on them. I used Black for ground. Since they are LED they will only work with correct wire on ground.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Red round lights and side lights are very bright! ...
customer_reviews.text: Red round lights and side lights are very bright! This product has been improved in details: 1. No screws, no worries about rust, completely waterproof; 2. New upgrades of red lamp bead, brighter than my old lamps with screws! 3. I put it in water for a while, completely waterproof, and I'm ready to buy another one to install on my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Haoqi Zhang

customer_reviews.title: no instructions..
customer_reviews.text: The wiring harness seems ok but the wires on the tail lights are red, green and black. harness is green, yellow, brown and white. paperwork does not say what is what. disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: derek

customer_reviews.title: The product is great! Lights are particularly bright
customer_reviews.text: The product is great! Lights are particularly bright! It is more waterproof than other brands of lights, without screws, the lamp surface is smoother and brighter. And the reflective strips are useful.
customer_reviews.author: Ball

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof at all!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage! These lights are not waterproof whatsoever. First time putting the jet skis in the water it filled the lenses and killed the LED boards.
customer_reviews.author: palatkagas

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely NOT Submersible!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely not submersible! First use . Water inside! ??? Less than 12” under water ! Total waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: The Fox 🦊

customer_reviews.title: Product was great!! Lights are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Product was great!! Lights are fantastic. But the 25 feet of cable was incorrect and had to go to a local store and purchase another 25 foot cable. The one that came with only measured close to 21 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great LED lights for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install work great and awesome price..you cant go wrong with these for a boat trailer
customer_reviews.author: Ski Key

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping everything in the pictures came in 2 days. Everything you need to have brand new lights and wiring on your trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for redoing the lights on my fathers trailer. Kit was easy to install and came with all the hardware and connecters.
customer_reviews.author: patrick taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Lights are not submersible as advertised. lights filled with water after first use, every single light went bad in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Delafe1

customer_reviews.title: Opened box and lens fell off. See picture. ...
customer_reviews.text: Opened box and lens fell off. See picture. No...I am not going to apply glue or do any repair to try and make it waterproof. FIX YOUR QUALITY CONTROL.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money! Lens flew off just a couple months after installing them, now it no longer is working
customer_reviews.author: TIM CRUM

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Junk back down into the water one time and burnt one side out .
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: nice unit, working great for me on my salt ...
customer_reviews.text: nice unit,working great for me on my salt water trailer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Item came quickly and exactly as described. Instructions were included and clear to understand. Brake light looks to be nice and bright. Looking forward to see how these hold up in Michigan weather. *I received this product to try at a discount for my unbiased opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mama_Cook

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Bright
customer_reviews.text: This trailer light kit is exactly what my old trailer needed. The quality of the kit and the amount of LEDs make this an excellent choice for someone looking to redo their trailer lights. I'll be getting more for all of my other trailers. No screw holes make the lights look a lot better than the typical ones you'd buy.
customer_reviews.author: Hodor Lanister

product_meta.title: HQAP 2018 New 12V Submersible LED Trailer Light Kit: Two Combined Stop taillights, Turn Signals, Two Amber LED Marker Lights, 21 feet and 4 feet Coded Wiring Harness,10pcs Reflective Stickers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars29 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
